001/** This controller provides functionality for viewing inventory by displaying all ingredients dynamically
002 * @author Aarya Patel
003 */
004package src.controller;
005
006import src.controller.useful_functions.user_role;
007import src.model.ingredient;
008
009import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
010import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
011
012import java.util.List;
013
014import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
015import javafx.fxml.FXML;
016import javafx.scene.control.Button;
017import javafx.scene.layout.VBox;
018
019import src.data.ingredients_data;
020
021/**
022 * This class provides functionality for viewing inventory by displaying all ingredients dynamically
023 */
024public class view_inventory_controller {
025    /**
026     * This function handles the back click action to return to the inventory page
027     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
028     */
029    @FXML
030    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
031        switch_scene("GUI/inventory_page.fxml", event);
032    }
033
034    /**
035     * This function handles the view inventory click action to navigate to the view inventory page
036     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
037     */
038    @FXML
039    private void handle_view_inventory(ActionEvent event) {
040        switch_scene("GUI/view_inventory.fxml", event);
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * This function handles the update inventory click action to navigate to the update inventory page
045     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
046     */
047    @FXML
048    private void handle_update_inventory(ActionEvent event) {
049        switch_scene("GUI/update_employee.fxml", event);
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * This function handles the add inventory click action to navigate to the add inventory page
054     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
055     */
056    @FXML
057    private void handle_add_inventory(ActionEvent event) {
058        switch_scene("GUI/add_inventory.fxml", event);
059    }
060
061    /** Container for dynamically generated ingredient buttons */
062    @FXML private VBox ingredients_container;
063
064    /**
065     * Initializes the view inventory page by dynamically creating buttons for all ingredients
066     */
067    @FXML
068    public void initialize() {
069
070        //Topping Button Insertion and Handler
071        List<ingredient> ingredients = ingredients_data.getIngredients();
072        for (ingredient ingredient : ingredients) {
073            Button btn = new Button(ingredient.getIngredientName());
074            btn.setMaxWidth(Double.MAX_VALUE);
075            ingredients_container.getChildren().add(btn);
076        }
077    }
078}
